reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights in early June in a 1 bedroom apartment over a long weekend.
reviews.title: Really enjoyable stay

reviews.text: The apartment was very spacious, with a large bathroom that included a good sized closet, spa bath, excellent shower and separate loo.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The open plan living area included a well appointed kitchen (including a dish washer), a dining table and 4 chairs and a lounge area. There was also a laundry.
reviews.title: Great Place!
Fantastic Place
reviews.text: The apartment's balcony was well equipped with a table & 4 chairs, 2 recliners and a small electric BBQ.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Seahaven is in a great location, right on the beach. Therefore, I was surprised at the average quality of the rooms. Our room had a very musty smell and was decorated in a very 80's style. We tried to get rid of the smell, but it lingered, so I went to the reception and they were helpful. We got upgraded to an oceanfront room, which was nice (but oddly arranged), and had no smell. Unfortunately, we could not stay there for the remainder of our trip, so we decided to go to another hotel on the beach (Sand Castle Inn). The staff at the Seahaven were nice about canceling the remainder of our reservation.
reviews.title: Nice location but musty room

reviews.text: Seahaven is in the most fantastic location. It has great swimming pools and direct access to the beach, plus a massage table on the beach. It's really great.
reviews.title: Unbeatable location. Hotel just fine!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing was that there was a strange smell about the place. I asked what it was, and they said it was mulch on the garden. I don't know if this was true. so maybe if you book, just ask about the smell... we weren't the only ones who noticed it!!
reviews.title: Lovely seaside hotel in great resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, stench aside, the place is compltely fantastic.
reviews.title: Beautiful Resort next to the beach

reviews.text: We arrived at the seahaven resort in Noosa after a long drive and were told our room had been cancelled due to us not replying to their confirmation email. So first warning - make sure you reply to it! Luckily it was off season so they had a room for us!
reviews.title: Fabulous location - excellent choice !

likes.liked: — Location - Beachfront - Service and of course the Beach and the Sun
likes.disliked: — Did not spend enough time there !

reviews.text: Two of us stayed for 4 nights in a basic, lowest grade room. The room has a king-sized bed and a very small kitchenette which was enough for what we needed, the bigger rooms have bigger kitchens. The room was very clean and had plenty of storage space as well as an in-room safe.
reviews.title: Great hotel

likes.disliked: — The birds at 4 in the morning.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Access to the pool/beach was easy and complimentary beach towels/chairs are available.
reviews.title: Location - two thumbs up!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We drove to Noosa and parking was easy, always plenty of spaces and staff were always very helpful.
reviews.title: Seahaven Resort Noosa Heads

reviews.text: The only bad point i can think of from our stay in Noosa was that the birds like to have a noisy sing-song for half-hour about 4 in the morning.
reviews.title: Great Location!

likes.liked: — Location - Beach, Dining, Shopping right at your doorstep
likes.disliked: — The key card they gave us initially didn't work very well.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really enjoyed the Seahaven and would stay there again.
reviews.title: Wonderful location
